title: Now offering 10% discount off the rent for first 3 full month!
posting_body: 3 bedrooms, 2 baths home full with taste of luxury is now available for move-in!
Living area features vaulted ceilings and a beautiful brick fireplace!
Updated kitchen with granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances, breakfast bar and dining area!
Main bedroom includes a walk-in closet and unsuited bathroom with a garden tub and walk-in shower!
Schedule your convenient self-showing today!***Rent does not include any-in additional monthly fees.

This home exclusively features additional amenities, please inquire for more details Smart Home package Maintenance concierge Includes quarterly air filter delivery Also section 8 or any kind of housing voucher is allowed for rent only.
